title: The Nature of Light
creator_credit: Coronet Instructional Films and David A. Smart
brief_description: Two teenage boys (Bud and Sandy) on a camping trip, demonstrate the uses of light through various practical experiments. Demonstrations include: the law of reflection, differences between convex and concave lenses, how the eye works etc.
